subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Which famous forts in Rajasthan were built during the reign of the Mughals?
question_hi: मुगल राजां के अधिकांचां राजशास्त्री की मूलबोधिनी के अनुसार किये गए किताबों में से कौन से फोट पहले हैं?

options.option_explanation: Ranthambore Fort is a famous fort located in Sawai Madhopur district of Rajasthan. It was built by Rawal Jaisal in 1156 AD.
Chittorgarh Fort is a historic fort located in Chittorgarh district, Rajasthan. It was built by Rawal Meera in 944 AD.
Amber Fort is a historic fort located in Jaipur district, Rajasthan. It was built by Rawal Jai Singh in 1592 AD.
Mehrangarh Fort is a historic fort located in Jodhpur district, Rajasthan. It was built by Rao Jodhpur in 1459 AD.
Kumbhalgarh Fort is a historic fort located in Kumbhalgarh district, Rajasthan. It was built by Rana Kumbha in 1443 AD.
